import React from "react"; import jumpTo from "../../modules/Navigation"; function SingleProduct(props) { const { productItem } = props; return (
jumpTo(`/trang-chu/san-pham/${productItem.product_Id}`) } >
{/*
-$20
*/}
{productItem.product_Name}
{productItem.price} VNĐ {(parseFloat(productItem.price) + 30)} VNĐ
props.addToBag(productItem.product_Id)} >
Thêm vào giỏ hàng
); } export default SingleProduct;
